values:
Well I didn't even realize that I never told everyone that I was switching to friends only......I guess I forgot. Anyway, there are probably some very confused people who wonder how I went from updating everyday to not updating for a month. Well, now you know why.

In conclusion......if you wanna read this, leave me a comment and maybe I'll add you.....if I know you and trust youm you're in.....

GOD BLESS

i've been on top of the world since about six months ago,
marking the first time i laid eyes on you.
i lost all train of thought as i entered the room.
i saw what looked like really good food,
then i saw you and so did you.
i wanna wake up naked next to you,
kissing the curve in your clavicle.
kissing your clavicle.
i've been on top of the world since about 1 week ago,
marking a time when i was drunk enough to talk to you.
i lost all train of thought as your eyes met mine.
told you i thought you were gorgeous.
you gave me your phone number,
i gave you mine.
before you left i said that you can bet i'll be bothering you soon.
 you said, "no bother, please do."
 i've called you twice.
 it's been a hellish fight to not think about you all the time.
sitting around waiting for your call.
i wanna wake up naked next to you,
kissing the curve in your clavicle.
kissing your clavicle.
i wanna wake up naked next to you,
kissing the curve in your clavicle.


This song is soooo sexy, Mmmmmmmm......Matt Skiba......Oh gosh, so hot!!!!!!!!!!

Well, at the library today, what to my eyes should appear but an old man reading Cosmo. I was thinking "Ew, dirty old man" until he crossed his legs, now I don't know what to think.......

So anyway, I'm definitly gonna make this friends only. I promise that it's nothing against you who read my lj without being on my friends list; it's only a way of knowing who is. I fear that someone is reading it that I should really know about since I talk about them all the time. As a matter of fact, after this entry I'll be able to be oh-so-specific as to who he is. So, anyway.........

I'll post more in "friend mode" as I choose to call it.

I love you all, thank you, come again!

GOD BLESS

Hawaiian shirts: $18 and $4 at Meijer
Black socks: $4 at Meijer
Black pants: $40 at Old Navy
Not having to get up at 4 to be at a job I hate: priceless

"I wanna make you smile whenever you're sad,
Carry you around when your arthritis is bad,
All I wanna do is grow old with you.

"I'll get you medicine when your tummy aches,
Build you a fire if the furnace breaks,
Oh, it would be so nice to grow old with you.

"I'll miss you, kiss you, give you my coat when you are cold
Need you, feed you, even let you hold the remote control.

"So let me do the dishes in our kitchen sink,
Put you to bed when you've had too much to drink,
Oh, I could be the one who grows old with you,
I wanna grow old with you."

I love that song, I love the Wedding Singer, I love you!
Love, love, love.....why do I have so much love?
Why do I love you so much, when you barely acknowledge my existence?
WTHeck is wrong with me? I'm crazy.....about you. Oh my gosh, there I go getting all floopy and stuff because of that silly boy.

Hmmmm........love.

GOD BLESS

I don't know what it is. It could be the fact that I worked out this morning, or maybe I had a really good dream. It could be that I'm done working at McDonalds and I know that I never have to go back there again. Whatever it may be, I feel so beautiful today (bop bop bop bop bop ba da bop). I know this is all gonna sound so conceited, but I looked in the mirror this morning, and I could not figure out why he doesn't wanna be with me. I mean, come on, there's really nothing about me that's worth writing me off. And here's a great question: WHO THE HELL DOES HE THINK IS GONNA PUT UP WITH HIS SHIT! No offense to the guy, but, honestly, he's so retarded sometimes. He's annoying, he can be very judgmental, and, although I think he's the hottest man alive, most of the girls I've ever talked to don't think that he's that much to look at. Yet, I'm crazy about him. I know that I could just fall in love with him at the drop of a hat! He must be gay! LOL

Oh my gosh; I went running this morning. I AM SO EFFING OUT OF SHAPE! It's gonna take like a month to get to any point of being anywhere close to a place that I can breathe. Oh well, it's all for two good causes:
1. I want to be healthy.
2. It bothers me that I paid $80 for Abercrombie jeans, and now they dont' fit anymore.

Well, off to anywhere with Rascall Flatts blaring! I've decided that These Days and Praying For Daylight were my songs for that stupid boy!

GOD BLESS YOU ALL!

Okay, I must post a correction to my last post. As annoying as this is, I know that it's only done in love, which I'm not used to so I didn't look at it like that! I'm sorry for that post. I guess I just have to deal with it for a little over a month and just get over it! But it does really suck that my grandpa won't change my parental settings. He's just like "It's unneccesary, blah blah blah......" And I really hate dial-up! So slow, so stupid. AOL sucks the big one!

Oh man, I think that I should take a nap. I'm still tired from yesterday!

So, with that, I'm off to find something to do........

GOD BLESS

Oh my gosh, this is so why I didn't wanna live with my grandparents! I am 18 effing years old, and he doesn't want me going to the mall because I was gone all day yesterday! Like, who cares?!?!?!?!? This is so retarded. Apparently I'm sposed ot stay home and be extremely bored all effing summer! This is so far from being cool! If you wanna relieve me of utter boredom call me.....(248)879-2308, unless you have Verizon then call the celly!

Today was so awesome! I got to go to Leonard for Katie's open house! I'm spending the night tonight. We're gonna have fun watching home movies and being goofy! YAY! I love being goofy! I really miss my Tessa, though. I wish she still loved me! I guess she just doesn't have any time left for me because her whole life is consumed with her Jason! Oh well. Tessa, I'll miss you; I guess have a good life is in order! (In case anyone is wondering, this is all an attempt to get Tessa to at least return my phone calls, failure to do which may cause her to become the next Rachel.)

I love how all of my girls get bfs and just leave me out in the cold world! Maybe I should just get a bf, too. Too bad the guy I want isn't interested! Hmm.....what to do?

Oh well......I love you guys, even those who ignore me now!

GOD BLESS!

Well, I'm finally finished at the evil Mickey D's! Today was my last day. I must say that today was the best working day ever! I think it's because no matter what happened I could just say, "Oh well, it's my last day!" What a feeling!

So, now I'm off to Niki and Anna's grad parties! YAY, fun!

See you all later......

p.s.
   Don't you think it's funny when someone doesn't know?......

GOD BLESS THIS MESS THAT I AM!

So, at Quartelife tonight, I had a mini breakdown. So many things just hit me so hard. They showed the video of Andrew Schoenbeck (I think that's how you spell it). Dan was talking about how so many times we just stay in our comfortable little church settings; we never leave our comfort zones!!! It's always about us. But in reality it's not supposed to be like that.

IT'S ALL ABOUT JESUS! It's about what HE wants, what HE needs us to do for HIS cause!  If a ten year old boy with cancer can, not only choose to live for Jesus, but actually follow through, then how much more could I? Even if I do it slowly, a little at a time. Just one life at a time.

This is my passion. He hit on the head the whole reason I want to teach high school. To attempt to assist God in changing the lives of teens in their hardest years! That is what I wanna be about! That is what I'm gonna do with my life! Please tell me that you wanna make the same decision. Maybe not to teach to do it, but to do it with your own talents! Join me in the fight for Jesus, please!

The best thing I heard tonight was: Decrease mw until there is only YOU!

GOD BLESS!

p.s.
   "Lighting was the best that I have ever seen in my life"! (Don't ask)

Well, life is really crazy right now. I'm gonna stay with my grandparents for the remainder of the summer in an effort to keep some of the shit from being beat out of me. I think this'll be best for us all. My mother won't have to stress about the lack of tidiness in my room or hurt her hands trying to kill me. I'll avoid the murder attempts, and get to live with people who for some odd reason love me. My grandparents will get to keep a watch on me; this is important to them because they do worry about me sometimes. I'll be in Troy, which is closer to stuff for me. So it should all work out for good.

I'm going to church tonight! I haven't gone in, like, a week and a half, so it should be good. I'm really excited for OU, though. I have fallen madly in love with the place: the freedom, the lack of my mother, etc. I am just counting down the days until August 27.

I hope I get my car back tomorrow. I have to get proof of insurance, and then my mother said she'd turn it over. She damn-well better! If I wasn't a Christian, I'd probably kill her, but, unfortunately, that would make Jesus sad, and I don't wanna do that.

I'm also very excited for this Star Wars 3 1/2 that Jason told me about. I am also condidering trying out for the daughter of Chewy, Jastherain. I already have the sound, I just need some really high platforms, I'm told that my wookie noise is superior to that of any other human being! Hahahahahaha. Okay, I appologize for this paragraph, only Jason and Tessa would have any idea what I'm talking about. Unless, my some miracle, Julie and Christian remembered it from Monday night.

Moving on:
So in conclusion; life is gonna get better as soon as I get my car, and we can all be happy. You may even see me smile if you happen to be at church tonight......

LOVE YOU ALL AND GOD BLESS YOU!

You Are 85% American
You're as American as red meat and shooting ranges. Tough and independent, you think big. You love everything about the US, wrong or right. And anyone who criticizes your home better not do it in front of you!
How American Are You?
This is awesome..... "I'm PROUD TO BE AN AMERICAN, WHERE AT LEAST I KNOW I'M FREE, I WON'T FORGET THE MEN WHO DIED, WHO GAVE THAT RIGHT TO MEA ND I'LL PROUDLY STAND UP..........................GOD BLESS THE USA!"

According to my calculations, when monday ends, it automatically becomes Tuesday....
Now, assuming that this is true, since yesterday was Monday, today MUST be Tuesday.

So, now that we've got all that cleared up......Today, being Tuesday the 12th, leaves me with 46 days until I can move to OU.....Arg! I should have just started this summer! Anyway, now comes the big decision of what to do with my next 46 days.....I'm thinking road trip! Oh wait, I just got a new job. DAMN! Uh, how about, I don't know. Anything has got to be better than this, aye. Maybe grandparents, if they ever call me, but.....blah, don't wanna. Rent-a-room for a month, then road trip til August 27: the best day of my life....? That sounds better, any info on rent a room, or have a room you wanna rent out? Call me.....

Until then, my friends I have one more thing to say:

Thank you to all of my friends who have been nothing but supportive and as helpful as possible, thank you so much for everything, the prayers, love, and encouragement, you have no idea how much this has all meant to me in this time of pain. God really has blessed me by putting all of you into my life.

In a time when I thought the only things that could soothe were cutting and Coldplay, you guys really came through.................

GOD BLESS AND THANK YOU

You ripped a hole in my AE capris,
You scraped my elbow and my knees,
You hit my face and broke my Fossil glasses,
You slapped and hit and kicked my ass.

You said words that made me cry,
You made we want to lay down and die,
You yelled at me and said "clean your room"
Cause that's all I ever hear from you.

Well, my room's cleaned, the dishes are washed,
I'm left with this feeling inside,
I'm sorry that I'm not good enough,
So now I no longer try.

................................................................................................

Daddy, why don't you love your girl, the first one you ever made? Mommy, why do you hurt me? I don't try to be bad; but nothing is ever good enough for you and you know is how to hit. Please don't try to kill me, I'm really still only a kid. Am I so horrible that I am undeserving of love? Why must I walk this earth alone?

My pants have a hole, my glasses, one lens, my makeup is running down my face; and all I can think is when will August 27 be here? I need to get out of here..............I can't take it anymore. I can barely type, my hands are so shaky.

HELP ME, PLEASE, GOD. I CAN'T DO THIS ANYMORE. I NEED YOU SO MUCH! PLEASE, JESUS, TAKE THIS PAIN, I PRAY.

GOD BLESS

Okay, I have to be optimistic now. After today, there is no more Oakland Township for Kayla. YAY! Bye, commie mother! I'm moving in with my grandparents. So things are gonna turn around, I hope. Pretty soon I'll be moving to OU. In less than two weeks I'll be done at McDonalds. I'm getting a new job and residence, so everything is gonna be alright, right? I sure hope so, cause being unhappy is getting really old.

It's gonna be okay, it's gonna be okay, it's all gonna be okay..........

See ya on the flipside.

GOD BLESS

Remember when we had so much fun together? We did the we did the craziest things: dancing in the rain; climbing up to the rooftop to watch the sunset, the stars, and occasionally, the sunrise, too; ding-dong ditch; etc............

Remeber when we used to talk about how we were gonna get married and the first year or two were gonna be amazing because we would finally be able to do all the things that we had been wanting to do?..........

Remember when you told me that I was the only one that you ever loved, even though I was four years younger than you, you felt that noone could understand you like I could?.................

Remember when you gave me a promise ring and told me that as long as I had that, you were the only man alive who could claim me, and that made you the luckiest man alive?..................

Remember when we hung out with my best friend of the time and her boyfriend?...............

Remember how we thought it was so stupid that they couldn't wait til marriage to get into each other's pants?.....................

Remember when that didn't seem like such a stupid thing to oyu anymore, and you asked me to sleep with you?...................

Remember when I refused and, after she had broken up with her bf, you slept with MY BEST FRIEND!?!?!?!?...........

Remember when I found out and almost killed myself?.................

Remember when you appolgized and told me that you'd never touch her again?...............

Remember how I gave you one more chance, and YOU SLEPT WITH HER AGAIN?!?!?!?!?!?!..............

Remember how I said that you should never call me agian?..............So why are you calling me? Leave me alone! You can't love me THAT much if you couldn't even wait for me.......I'm sorry that I wouldn't even so much as make out with you cause I wanted to be as pure as humanly possible when I got married. Nothing has changed, though, so GO AWAY! I don't know how you got my sn or phone number, but I suggest that you throw them away.......YOU RUINED IT JJ.....YOU'LL NEVER GET ME BACK!!! GIVE UP.....LEAVE ME THE FUCK ALONE! Why don't you go hang out with Crysta?

I love loving boys that don't love me, I love breaking my heart, I love crying over nothing, I love brand new starts, I love being so naive and getting myself hurt, I love being treated like shit and thrown into the dirt........................MEOW

I don't see why it is that my own parents don't love me at all. My father I obviously haven't seen in God knows how long, and my mother is a fucking lunatic........who would take away someone's car, telling them that they'd drive, then NOT FUCKING PICK THEM UP?!?!?!?!?! I mean it only takes a very small grain of common sense to realize that that's not something that normal people do.

I seriously feel like noone in this world loves or understands me. All I ever hear is shit like, "We don't ever know what you're talking about...." or sarcastic comments about my level of inteligence, or I guess the lack thereof.........

I just don't understand how I can be SO horrible that there is noone that gives a crap about me. I wish I was dead right now. I don't wanna be here anymore. My friends don't care, all the guys in my life turn out to be assholes or creaps, and the only one that loves me right now is Jesus, if that. And that thought just makes me wanna die more so I can go to Heaven.

It can't be that hard, little cutter, just cut a little deeper this time, just cut a little deeper........

Ah, sweet cut, good cut, lovely little cuts..........

Oh, how they make all the pain go away, just cut, deeper, deeper, now just a little deeper..........

Float out of existence, where it doesn't matter if anyone cares cause there is nobody, just dark, cloudy air, and all the emo you could ever ask for..............Dashboard, mmmm.............

La la, nothing hurts anymore, la la.

Hahahahahahahahahahahaha.............how could anything have ever been bad, cutter land is soooo good..........

Mmmmm...how my knife shines, how my skin bleeds, how it all melts away.........now put on some Weezer....."Say it Ain't so....."..........I love Weezer.......................

Don't go too deep, mother doesn't get her full punishment yet, we'll keep her in suspense, a note tied to my bed, my arm, soaked in blood, hanging off the bed............

Hush, little cutter, don't say a word
Pretty soon it won't hurt
Then she'll be sorry that she ruined my life
And it'll all be allright........

Well, so long and good night for now...........

See you on the flipside............

Okay, don't get me wrong, I love OU, but that doesn't mean that I wanna be stuck here without my car or celly, until God-knows when. Why is my mom so retarded? And, by the way, I DO have things that must be done today! But, of course, she doesn't fucking care what is goin on in my life! She doesn't care that I have a thousand things to do so that I can come back and register for my fucking classes which I couldn't do today because of her own damn stupidity. She doesn't care that I may have to work tonight, but in order to find out I NEED MY FUCKING PHONE!!! No, that requires too much logic for her simple-minded, self-centered little brain to comprehend. All she knows is that SHE doesn't want me to have my car, but SHE is not going to come pick me up. So, what now? Am I supposed to fucking walk ALL THE WAY BACK TO 32 MI?!?!?! Maybe I should just commit suicide, that'll show her.....then she'll be miserable for the rest of her life! Muah ha ha ha ha............Well, catch you later..........if I ever get my fucking car back.


p.s. I would like to appologize for my use of vulgar language in this entry.......I don't usually talk like that, but sometimes there just are no nice words to describe!

1)It's time for me to move on.....sometimes you just gotta let go, so bye bye my love, hello my friend
2)Not all guys are scum.........some are just amazingly out of my league, and, of course, those are the ones I want
3)Boys will do stupid things, live with it
4)Loving someone that doesn't love you back is stupid, because you only hurt yourself in the end
5)Naps are AMAZING!
6)When a guy says he'll call, he means in like two weeks
7)You should never leave cd's or makeup in your car in Detroit, even if it's locked
8)LOVE STINKS-GOD HEALS
9)I'm not even close to being the brightest bulb in the bunch, nor the prettiest rose in the bouquet
10)Things happen fast at fireworks
11)Old men think I look 22 or 23 (bifoculs play tricks)
And the #12 revelation of the day is.................

I'M NOT GOOD AT GETTING OVER PEOPLE!

THANK YOU AND GOD BLESS

Ugh. Why are guys in general so stupid? I don't understand why certain guys treat you differently depeding on who they are around. Actually, in this case, they treat me just fine when:
a) We're somewhere talking one on one........
b) When we're on the phone, and nobody is around him...........

See a pattern? In case you don't, the pattern is the fact that he treats me like a really good friend when noone is around, but the second one of his/our friends are around, it's like he's got something to prove. Am I that horrible that he actually has to go out of his way to make sure that noone thinks we are friends?!?!?! Arg. What aggravates me even more is that I still like him, and, what's worse, I don't even want to get over him. It's too much work and stress. Plus, part of me keeps hoping that he'll just give in and like me, too. What makes things worse is that I know deep down inside that it's never gonna happen, but I just don't wanna give up hope. He is everything I have ever wanted in a man, and I doubt that there is anyone else like him in the world. Oh, silly boy, when will you learn? Someday you'll realize how good you would have had it. How many other girls are gonna put up with all the shit you do? Who are you gonna find that'll look at how absolutely retarded you can be and still be crazy about you? Good luck with that one!

All is not lost, however. There are other guys out there that are less retarded, and much cuter! I know this because I know them, and I've seen them........Oh, boy, here we go again, right? Well, no. I may be trying to move on, but I'm not about to go and let myself fall for the next thing with a cute butt and killer smile. Nope, not gonna happen.

I'm so confused right now. I appologize for this incredulously long entry; I've just got so many things on my mind right now.

"Here I am
ONCE AGAIN
I'M TORN INTO PIECES
Can't deny it
Can't pretend
I just thought
You were the one
Broken up
Deep inside
But you won't get 
To see the tears I cried
Behind these hazel eyes."

Well, I hope you all have better days than I've been having......

GOD BLESS YOU, MY LOVES!

It's so crazy how people will throw their lives away for nothing........all is for naught (or however that's spelled).

Boys are stupid, throw rocks at them.............

Anyway, yeah, um, bored...........

Meow...............

This entry has no point whatsoever! I guess I'll save you anymore boredom.......

GOD BLESS

When did things decide to get so complicated? I mean, I closed my eyes, and before I knew it, I was 18, going into college, working two jobs, and losing my mind! I've been so excited about everyhting that I haven't had the time to think of how crazy this all is. I don't even know what to do.

It's so crazy to look back, I mean, I was five years old like a week ago. No cares in the world, just chillin in Leonard. I miss those days. I know God has wonderful stuff to come, but right now I just wanna reflect on those things that have happened in my past: the friends I've had, the leassons I've learned, etc.

"Oh, to be young again, for scraped knees are easier to mend than broken hearts........"

Well, I'm gonna go now, but I want you to know that someday, when I'm looking back on this period of my life, just as I'm looking back now, you will be the ones that I remember fondly. I love you guys.

GOD BLESS YOU, WHEREVER YOU MAY GO!

Oh what a tangled web we weave. So engrossed by our own emotions and problems that we can't even see what's going on around us. There are broken hearts, lives, homes, dreams, and spirits. What do we do for these? Nothing. We go on with our own little lives, making sure that we're getting what we think that we need and ignoring the needs of others. Then we wonder what the cause of the major degradation of society is, when in reality it is, in fact, ourselves. If we all could just show a fraction of the love that Jesus showed in his days on Earth, the world would be a much better place.

When a "Christian" family rejects their 19 year old son because he wanted to move out and they didn't want him to, when a group of "Christians" fights a group of people just because they believe differently or have different morals instead of just loving them, when someone who's dress isn't up to the likes of a church so they look down on them and don't make them feel welcome, when things like this happen it makes you wonder what's wrong with the world, even Christians. It's no wonder that Christianity is so rejected by society, look at what we've done to ourselves. Jesus hung out with tax collectors and hookers, why can't we hang out with homos and criminals, with those who aren't fortunate enough to afford nice clothes for church. Instead of jumping to judge, why don't we HELP PEOPLE? Why don't we show people what Jesus was all about? Just a thought.......

I love you guys so much, you rock, you help lift my spirits when I'm down, you encourage me towards God, now please say that you believe that we can do that for others outside of ourselves to help tham out too.

GOD BLESS

I dont' even know where I should start with this entry. There's so much stuff going on in my heart right now. Good things, bad things, God things, sad things. There are so many awesome things happening in my life right now, but it's hard to not focus on the fact that the thing I want more than almost anything is so far out of reach. I know I should just be grateful for the many things I want that I do have, but it's so hard.

Why is it that falling for someone is sooo easy, even when you're scared, but getting over them is soooooooooooooooo hard?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?

"I'm taking my time
I'm trying to leave the memories of you behind
I'm gonna be fine
As soon as I get your picture right out of my mind

Chorus:
I wanna feel the way you make me feel when I'm with you
I wanna be the only hand you need to hold on to
But everytime I call
You don't have time
I guess I'll never get to call you mine

You're nothing at all
I know there's a million reasons why I shouldn't call
With nothing to say
Could easily make this conversation last all day

(Chorus)

Another lesson I did not get to learn
You're my obsession
I've got nowhere to go

(Chorus)"

Guess who that song reminds me of............

Anyway..........

Call me if you wanna hang out: I'll see if I can pencil you in....hahahahaha

GOD BLESS YOU ALL, YOU HAVE NO IDEA HOW MUCH I LOVE ALL OF YOU!

The sun is out. It is a gorgeous day, or so it would appear. In the hearts of Pistons fans everywhere a storm is raging. Maybe next year..............

DE-TROIT BAS-KET-BALL! We still love you, Pistons!

GOD BLESS

I am so tired! Sleep must be had soon before I die of exhaustion! I'm so going back to sleep after this. I don't even know why I'm doing this right now. I have NOTHING to talk about. I worked ALL day yesterday, I thought I was gonna die. Tessa and Katie came over last night, and we watched movies. It was fun. Tessa spent the night and now we're watching Jerry Springer, for some odd reason.

SUMMER ROCKS! 

GOD BLESS THIS MESS!

What is wrong with the men in today's society?!?! Don't they see that this obsession with lust and porn and things of the flesh is ruining them? Don't they see that htey are impairing their ability to have a meaningful realtionship? I don't know if any of you knew this, but I've dated two guys that were obsessed with it. You know what happened? The first one broke up with me for not having sex with him and being kinky like the girls in his movies. The second one cheated on me with one of my best friends because I wouldn't do it with him, but she would.

I know first hand how heart breaking this can be. Furthermore, guys who look at a lot of porn have higher expectations of their girlfriends, wives, and other women in general. Think of how it would be if, by some miracle, a guy who watched a lot of porn went along with his fiance's no sex until marriage policy; then they got married and had sex. But it wasn't like the pornos he loved so much to watch. So he cheated on her until he found the girl that was like what he was looking for. But he never found her. One of his lovers ends up getting pregnant...oops! Now he is faced with how to tell her that he's married and tell his wife that he's father, but she's not a mother. You think I'm exaggerating? This has happened.

Today's society makes these things seem like "no big deal" and something that "everyone's doing", but in reality it IS a big deal and NOT everyone is doing it. In fact it's such a big deal that I'll never again date anyone who does do it. We should not just sit there and take this, girls. It's time to stand up for ourselves! Just praying and encouraging all of the men in our lives; friends, boyfriends, whoever; and even some girls we know that do it will be a big help. It will never be completely gone, but with a little time and prayer, we can help make a difference. Please, don't ever make the mistake I made of thinking that it's no big deal!

GOD BLESS

Well, believe it or not, I went into the kitchen to get breakfast and realized that it was quarter to five! In the afternoon! I know. Missy's party was fun! I ended up spending the night, sleeping in until 2, watching Hitch with her bro and her mom while she packed, then heading for home as she headed off to Lexington, where she's gonna be a camp counsellor this summer! She has fun friends.

I feel like my brain is gonna cave in from my alergies! Arg! Well, off to better things.......

GOD BLESS YOU!

Summer is Amazing! My Friends are Amazing! Mostly, GOD IS AMAZING!

I went to Quarterlife last night with Tessa and Katie. We had so much fun! Then we all went to Ticonderoga, so fun! I know this is gonna sound silly and like a major delayed reaciton, but....

Dave Wilson spoke at Quarterlife, and gave pretty much the same message that he gave at Edge, but last night it REALLY hit me! I was like, "oh my gosh!" I am so ready to just hand it ALL over to Him, My God, My Lord, My Jesus!!!!

I'm so excited! And, while I was listening to the message, I had this really great idea: Tessa, Kat, and I are gonna be accountability partners! I'm so excited! I LOVE the idea of having some really close friends that you can "do life with".....

THIS IS GONNA BE THE BEST SUMMER OF MY LIFE!

GOD BLESS YOU ALL, HOPE YOU'RE HAVING AS MUCH FUN AS I AM!

OH MY GOSH! I love Summer! I am having such an amazing time with my friends! I'm so glad that this summer isn't sucking like last summer did! Parties, playgrounds, playing with the big balls at Meijer, shopping, driving around like a goon, swimming at midnight with naked boys! 

WOW....some summer, eh?

In fact, it's been so great so far that the only way it could be better is if a certain special someone felt the same way about me. Oh well, I'll just beat him up! Hahaha

These are the best days of my life: the summer of 2005!

I may die of a broken heart, but I'm having ALL the fun until then!

Call me if you wanna do something, I'm open to options!

I love all of your guts!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I'm in such a great mood that I'm gonna go back to having a public LJ. But only for most of the time, so if you're really my friend and you can be trusted with my more personal things, I still want you on my friends list, yo!

GOD BLESS

Hello, friends. If your'e reading this, I probably handed you a little piece of paper with this sit on it, or you happen ot read my LJ occasionally. But, anyway, you probably want details. Date: June 7, 2005
Time: 3:30-when you feel the urge to leave
Place: 6870 Northpoint
       Troy, MI 48363
[Either mapquest or call (248)496-9176 or post comment for directions]

OH MY GOODNESS! OH MY GOODNESS! OH MY GOODNESS!

Oh my goodness! Today, we had all the fun. Sorry, guys, but by the time graduation is over, all the fun will be had by us and there will be no more fun left in the world. Oh, the excitement!

I have one more exam left: Bible. This actually sucks, because we were supposed to memorize a Psalm, but I don't remember which one. I remember it being one that I already knew, but that doesn't tell me which one is was.  I'll have to call someone with a brain. Hahahahaha.

I have to work at five tonight at Gap, so I'm wasting time on the computer becasue I'm becoming a computer nerd now! Come see me at Gap if you're bored, but don't mess up my pretty stacks of clothes! Hahaha.

So-long, farewell, a vida ze adieu.
Adieu, adieu...
To you and you and you....

GOD BLESS THIS MESS THAT I AM!!!

Have you ever gone to work, where you folded clothes for like six and a half hours almost straight, then you came home and have to finish your laundry, which means more folding? I actually really like my job, but after a day of folding I don't wanna go home and do it.

There's only five more days until graduation!!!  I'm so excited that I could just pee my pants (if that weren't totally disgusting)

I got to go see my kitty today and hang out with Christian. His little kitten is so cute!  It's so tiny, it doesn't even seem real. It's wierd, though, because she's just like a big cat, only shrunken. Awe, so cute!

Okay, time for to do something else now.

That I could just about lose my mind

Hmm.......what to talk about? I love y'all like a chicken would love an increase in the beef industry. Wow! See what happens when I get bored? I say things that are even wierder than usual.  Um, yeah. Anywhoo....

"I've got another confession to make: I'm your fool......"

I decided that it wasn't necesary to go to school today. (Yay) All I have left to so is to take a few exams and show up at graduation. Oh, I also need to make that tape for the ceremony.  I went to OU today to figger out a few things. It turns out that giving them money fixes everything.

It doesn't seem right that a mere human could have such an effect on me.  I have yet to figger out why he does.  I mean, for Pete's sake, it would make a little bit of sense if we were, maybe, dating or if he were interested, but being that that is most definitely not the case, I'm thinking it's about time to move on.  Oh, and could I be more blatently obvious? Probably not, but I think if he knew, I'd never hear from him at all.  I don't know, but this is why I think that girls are stupid: we sit there and waste all of our energy thinking about that one guy, whether he's a boyfriend or a crush.  Isn't there a much better way to spend our time.

I was just thinking: wouldn't it be wierd if only one of your armpits smelled really good (like deodorent) and the other one smelled completely rank? Just some contemplations of a dumb blonde.

Okay, I realize that this is an uber-long entry, but I keep wanting to add things.  I'm sitting here watching FRIENDS, and as I watch them, I notice that they are all most happy when they are with somebody.  So I'm thinking to myself, "Is that a subliminal message, or is there really some truth in the fact that people are happier when they are loved?"  I think that it's very possible that the media puts things like this into our heads to get us to believe that you need someone to be happy. I mean I'm sure it would be great to be loved by someone besides Jesus, but I think that I'm pretty happy: aren't I? On second thought, I do want to be loved by someone, but not just anyone.

I guess I have nothing else to talk about. Go to the party or else!  TTYL

GOD BLESS

PEACE OUT

The best way to describe what I've been doing for the past two weeks is sheer, morbid stupidity.  My mom yelled at me and said some stuff that she didn't really mean, but my reaction to it was so stupid it needs to be told about.  I never saw what was really going on with her. I don't really talk to her much at all, which is no good on my part.  I didn't see the whole picture. I've been so selfish in this: just doing whatever I felt and not even taking into consideration her thoughts and feelings.  I felt so bad when I realized it.  We had a long talk, and now everything is cool again.  I guess it will be forever, now that I'm moving out, and we won't have anything to fight over.  I have to fix this all.

I finally got all the things done at OU that need to be finished before orientation, I only need to turn in one more thing so I can live there.  I'm so excited and so scared all at the same time.  I mean, I'm gonna be living on campus....yay.  Also though, I could end up with an a-hole roommate, or I might not be able to keep up academically. You know what though?  I'm just not gonna worry about it.  It's about time that I hand this over to God and just trust that He will take care of me; He will provide.

Well, now that I've bored you twice in one day, I'll say ariva derchi, toodloos, laterz, etc.

GOD BLESS

PEACE OUT

Oh man. I should be so lucky.

Well, today was pretty cool, I guess.  I went to OU to apply for a dorm for the fall (fingers crossed that I don't end up in a party dorm.)  We had a training session at work today; it was actually pretty cool.  I have to go back at 6:30 for real work.  Now I'm at the library, AGAIN, bored out of my mind.

The people at OU aren't that smart, apparently.  The reason I haven't been able to access my OU e-mail is because they had my birthdate wrong. Ugh!  Well, I'm so excited now: only 8 more days until graduation. (Not that I've been counting down since, like, my birthday or anything. Speaking of birthday, I can't wait until our party on Monday!  I hope the weather is nice.  It's gonna be so much fun.

Wow, this has been a very scattered entry.  I guess I'm lacking the brain power to concentrate right now.

Oh man, I just love my friends.  All of you are so great! What would I do without you?  I can't even imagine.

Well, I'm gonna go let my mind wander elsewhere......

GOD BLESS

PEACE OUT

Well, everything I have been working for the past thirteen years for is gonna come down to Friday, June 3, at 7:30 PM.  I'm so excited, I'm so happy, I'm so scared, and I'm so ready for this.  I don't even care if I trip on my face on the way to the stage, as long as I get my diploma. I'm almost completely set for Oakland University now. I can't wait to be a Grizzly.  I wanted to do the internship for Edge, but they only allow time for two classes per semester.  I don't wanna have to go to college for eight years.  I don't know, though, I'm going to look it over a few times and pray about it.  I know that God will lead me in my decision.  It's not so much God that I'm worried about, though, my grandma will have a fit if I'm only gonna take 2 classes a semester, and I don't wanna have to worry about that.

It's so wierd to look back and think about how it seemed the time it was taking to get to this point in my life was so long; now, looking back, it seems odd to think about the fact that I'm eighteen years old, I have a car, jobs, bills, and will soon be at college. The decision has been made: I'm moving in with my grandparents after graduation, and I'm going to live on campus during the academic school year.  I would like to get a job at Cedar Point next summer.  A few girls that I know are doing it, and it seems like so much fun. My friend Nicole said that she may be interested, also.

I don't really know what God is going to do with me. I'm sure He has something for me to accomplish, and I'm trusting that He will show me in His time. Until then, I will do my best and try to make it through.  Well, I'm gonna leave "y'all" now. TTYL

Just kidding....not quite finished. I was just reading something, and it made me realize that one of the saddest things ever is for someone you were pretty good friends with to just completely drop and ignore you.  And as much as that hurts, what's even worse is when they make an effort to be friends again, and you almost don't want to talk to them at all, for fear of getting hurt. I will always love my friends, and I will always be willing to restart a friendship, but do you think that there's a point that you have to say, "enough is enough"?  I mean is being naive and allowing people to lead you on and hurt you just as bad as not forgiving at all if it is ultimately going to cause you to end up in heartache? I don't know. You tell me.

God Bless

PEACE OUT

It's amazing how everything can go from great to pretty bad to awesome to absolutely rechid all in the course of like a week or two! I don't understand why I'm such an idiot, but I've learned my lessons now.  I know how to handle things now. I'll do better next time. The worst part will be the disappointment in my grandfather's eyes. He really thought I had it together, so did I. Well, at least I got into the college I want to go to, I'm graduating with red ropes, and I'm not gonna have to pay full price for collage (but apparently I'm gonna have to learn how to spell it).

I guess when it all comes down to it, things aren't so bad.  I just wish I had been able to learn my lesson from everyone else's mistakes instead of finding the, like, one thing that they didn't screw up and doing that! Ugh. Oh well, cest la vie, as the French say.

Gotta go now, God Bless.

PEACE OUT

Well.....so much for anything good ever happening!!!!!  I got a 25 on my ACT's which seemed like good news til everything else blew up in my face! My mom is so evil! I wish she would just leave me alone! I'm sick of all her bull honky!!!  She needs to realize that, yeah, I am an adult, but I'm also still a student and her daughter (note: not slave/housekeeper/chef/bank customer) which means that she should be taking care of me.  Not that I necesarily want her to, but until I can pay her back, she needs to lighten up and realize that just because I'm 18 now, doesn't mean that I'll magically just be able to take care of myself, especially when I still owe her $323. Ugh!

So, I'm not keeping the trailer, I'm not getting an apartment, and I'm not getting along with my mom! So it looks like I either live on campus, even if only for the non-summer semesters and live with my grandparents during the summer, or I move in with Julie. I actually really wanna live on campus, I think it'd be so fun!!!!!  So I guess that'll work out alright. I'm not getting nearly enough hours at the Gap, so I'm gonna go back to McDonald's full time mornings this summer, and work whatever nights that they need me at Gap. 

Almost graduation time!!!!!! Cedar Point is on Monday, senior skip day is on Friday, and Graduation is 8 days after that!!!!!!!   Yay!!! No more high school! "School's out forever!!!"

If you can guess title and artist of this song, I'll give you a cookie!:

"This single-minded fascination I've got....do you call it love....if you don't then what?
All I know is I don't know what you've done, but this train I'm on ain't about to jump the track that it's on!"


Well, I guess I should go do my chores now! (whoohoo for being grounded!)
PEACE OUT

Well, I'm almost a graduate, I'm almost an Oakland University student, and I'm almost out of debt. I'm almost completely happy, almost depressed, I almost miss some things, I have almost the biggest crush on someone that I was almost over, I'm almost in love with someone that I almost ruined a friendship with, I almost want my Ray-ray back. My grandma's aunt is almost 102 and now she's almost dead. =( It's almost summer, and I can almost go swimming and sunbathing. Almost, almost, almost.

Isn't almost a funny word. It's holds such a great meaning. It can be good or bad. It can be very close to everything you ever wanted or even closer to everything that you never wanted! Hmmm.....

I got my graduation robe today! Yay! One step closer! I almost (lol) can't wait. I'm sure that I'll live, though.

It's kinda funny, but I can feel God telling me things. Some things are encouragement, some are telling me things that I need to take care of. Even things that I had never thought would be an issue! I guess it's time to finish growing up, aye? I was thinking about how much I'm gonna miss everyone after we all graduate. I know that graduating is something I've been looking forward to my whole life, but I do have some great friends that I'm not gonna get to see as much once I graduate, and while that's sad, I guess that I should just consider it a part of life and move on!

Well, not much more to bore you with. I'll get back with y'all soon! Laterz!!!!!

PEACE OUT!

Well, what is there to say? I'm tired, stressed, and in love just to make things worse. No, actually, what makes things worse is that he could care less about me! Ugh! Well, going to sleep now. Bye bye.

PEACE OUT!

Please pray for me, homies!  I'm trying to bring someone to the Lord, guys, but only He can do it! Say it with me, "NOONE stands a chance when God wants something done!" No matter what!!!  HE wins! Jesus: 1 Everyone else: 0

JESUS IS MY HOMEBOY! HE'S GOT MY BACK! I THINK IT'S TIME TO RETURN THE FAVOR, DON'T YOU?

I can't wait til graduation! June 3rd 7 o'clock. Everyone I know is invited. If wanna go see proof that I'm not a complete idiot, please come!

I am gonna miss a few things, though. Such as....well.....um.....there must be something I'll miss about high school! Well, I'll figger it out someday; let me know if there's anything you can think of that I may miss!

Oh my goodness! You know that guy that you'd really love to get over, but he's just so amazing that you just can't? Well, I do. I wish that I had never started liking him.  I always do this! What's wrong with me? I think that I should just get hypnotized into never feeling this way about anyone and save myself some pain.

When it comes to love, I just don't have any luck! I want so badly to get married and have five kids and be a stay-at-home/soccer mom. I wanna find that person that is perfect for me. Someone that I can pray and grow in God with, someone that has the same passions and morals that I do.  Someone that's  a good Christian and would be a good husband and father and friend. Wow, no wonder I can't find anyone: talk about wanting someone so far out of my league that I can't even afford tickets to watch the game! (Hey! That was a cute little analogy!)

Ever have one of those days when you feel like taking a huge brush and painting the sky?

Well, I'm not feeling well, so I'm gonna go get some sleep! TTYL

PEACE OUT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

PEACE OUT
